sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"drawing-course"}}>{`Drawing Course`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basics"}}>{`Basics`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Line - the fundamentals of drawing`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Shape - four basics are square, circle, triangle and trapezoid`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Form - Form is the three dimensional part of drawing`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Value - This is basically how light and dark it is`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Perspective - The lines that make up shapes in a 3d world`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"tools"}}>{`Tools`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Paper`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Pencil`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Eraser`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Ruler`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"why-is-drawing-so-important"}}>{`Why is drawing so important?`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Drawing is all about fundamentals. It is the building block of all art. Drawing is the easiest way to convey an idea.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"testing-metric"}}>{`Testing metric`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`How good can you sketch an eye?`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Start light`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Move fast`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Consider reflections`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basics-of-line-drawing"}}>{`Basics of line drawing`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`All different types:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Straight`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Curved`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Squiggly etc`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The outline for an image is known as the "contour lines"`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You want to have contrast, so be sure to use line quality.`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
